member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_FILTER_RANGE
member.summary: Defines the range of supported values for an image filter.

member.summary: The minimum value of the filter.

member.summary: The maximum value of the filter.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_FILTER_RANGE.Default
member.summary: The default value of the filter.
